featured.text: In fact, this seems so common that the Japanese now have a term for it: bura- hara, meaning blood-type harassment.

definition.zh_def: 腹部，特別是指身體的下部或腹腔。
definition.en_def: The abdomen, especially referring to the lower part of the body or the belly.
definition.example: He felt a sharp pain in his hara after eating too much.
